name: Dagger of Shadows
description: A deadly dagger with shadowy powers.
looks: The dagger has a dark blade that seems to absorb light. It has a slim, curved design and a hilt wrapped in black leather.

special_effects.shadow_strike: Allows the wielder to vanish into shadows and strike the enemy from behind for extra damage.

name: Shield of Protection
description: A sturdy shield that provides increased defense against physical attacks.
looks: The shield is made of reinforced steel and has a polished surface. It is adorned with engravings of a shield emblem.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is used for healing and restoration.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and is adorned with intricate carvings of leaves and vines. It emanates a soft green glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and potions.

name: Greatsword
description: A massive two-handed sword with a wide blade and immense power.
looks: The greatsword has a long handle made of solid oak, adorned with intricate carvings. The blade is made of polished steel and is double-edged, capable of delivering devastating blows.

special_weapon_skills.greatsword_mastery: Increases damage and critical strike chance with greatswords.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that is used for healing and restoring health.
looks: The staff is made of crystal-clear glass with a silver handle. It is adorned with shimmering gems and has a soft, soothing glow.

special_weapon_skills.Healing Mastery: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells.

special_effects.healing_touch: Each successful hit restores a small amount of health to the wielder.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A magical ring that enhances the wearer's strength.
looks: The ring is made of silver and has a symbol of strength engraved on its surface. It emits a faint golden glow.

name: Amulet of Wisdom
description: A magical amulet that enhances the wisdom of the wearer.
looks: The amulet is made of shimmering silver and has a large sapphire embedded in the center. It emits a soft glow.

name: Blessed Shield
description: A holy shield with a divine aura.
looks: The shield is made of shining silver and is adorned with holy symbols. It emanates a bright golden glow.

special_effects.divine_protection: Increases resistance to dark damage by 20%.

name: Silver Ring
description: A simple silver ring with an engraved pattern.
looks: The ring is made of pure silver and has a polished finish. It has a pattern of delicate swirls engraved on its surface.
